Description: Unique mobile event identifier. The primary key for this table.
The mobile device identifier. Demographics are associated with this number.
Feature generated from the data. Most events in china take place in three cities: Beijing, Chengdu, Hong Kong, and Shanghai.
Feature generated from the data. The number of active apps during the event.

These columns are also features generated from the data. These are categories of apps that are active during the event. A value of 1 means that at least 1 app from this category is active. See the file generalizeCategories.R in the GitHub repository for the R code that generated these features.
